original_title: VeggieTales The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything Sing-Along Songs and More
overview: Veggietales fans have gathered for the world premiere of The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything - A VeggieTales Movie, but the only copy of the film has been stolen! Will someone step up, do what's right and help save the day? Or will Pirates be lost forever?
title: VeggieTales The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything Sing-Along Songs and More
